oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ḥilyat al-abdāl : manuscript, undated
Fawāʼid Ṣūfīyah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn al-ʻArabī , 1165-1240
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "al-ḥamd lillāh ʻalá mā alhama wa-ʻallamanā mā lam nakun naʻlam ... ammā baʻd fa-innī istakhartu Allāh laylat al-ithnayn al-thānī ʻashar Jumādá al-ūlā sanata 599 bi-manzil āl Mayya bi-al-Ṭāʼif ... qayyadtu lahumā hādhihi al-kurrāsah sammaytuhā Ḥilyat al-abdāl..."
MS Arab 225. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sufism--Early works to 1800
